title: Plant Pathology: Pytorch efficientnet_b4 GPU
description: Training with P100 GPUModel: EfficientNet b4 input size 320x512 (.npy files are generated by https://www.kaggle.com/welkinfeng/plant-pathology-generate-npy-data) using P100 GPU: train time: 60s / epoch, test time: 50s using single core TPU (320x320 input size): train time: 3-6mins for the first epoch, 60s for rest epoch, test time: 50s (https://www.kaggle.com/welkinfeng/plant-pathology-pytorch-tpu-efficientnet-b4) v3: 5 fold LB 0.968 v7: use weighted CE loss
